Deicidal Eye.name: Deicidal Eye
Deicidal Eye.flavor: Your merciless perspective reveals every weakness, no matter how insignificant.
Deicidal Eye.effect: Your attacks ignore any resistance or immunity possessed by the target, and the target gains vulnerable 5 to your attacks. This effect lasts until you are reduced to 0 hit points or until you use the power on a new target.
Deicidal Eye.special: Increase the vulnerability by 5 if the target is higher level than you or if the target is a solo monster. Increase the vulnerability by 10 if the target is both.
